name: After Eden
description:
After Eden Demo is a short experimental experience. 

The full game is still in development. Please consider joining our discord channel to follow the game's development or share your feedback on the comment section below. We would greatly appreciate all feedback.

Controls:

The game uses mouse and keyboard. Controller support will be added in the future.

If you are trying to play version 1.04 of the demo, please downloaded the latest version. There is a critical bug which hinders progression in version 1.04.

Contact Info:
